name: Tab Age Tracker
changes: Removed 'unsafe-eval' from Content Security Policy for Chrome compatibility
Fixed extension loading issues with latest Chrome security requirements
Improved script loading procedures to avoid any CSP violations
Ensured all charts load properly without requiring 'unsafe-eval'
Enhanced fallback mechanism to display data even when charts can't load
Fixed all issues reported by users with Chrome extensions
Made the extension fully compatible with the latest Chrome security policies
technical_changes: Removed 'unsafe-eval' from Content Security Policy in manifest.json
Updated chart loading system to avoid the need for eval() functionality
Improved dynamic script loading procedure to comply with strict CSP
Enhanced error handling for CSP-related issues
Added detailed error messaging for chart loading failures
Simplified chart initialization to avoid complex dynamic evaluation
Pre-loaded Chart.js at head level for better script initialization
Updated to support Chrome's stricter security policies around extension CSP
